We have heard that some homeowners associations tell their residents that, but it is Florida state law that they cannot prevent you from adding solar panels to your home

Here is a snippet from Florida Statute 163.04 'THE FLORIDA SOLAR RIGHTS ACT'

I'm happy to answer any questions. I've helped multiple HOA residents (including myself) work through what an HOA thinks they can govern and what they can not. Happy to talk it through
